    • updateAutoFill

      public static void updateAutoFill(net.minecraftforge.fluids.capability.IFluidHandlerItem toDrain, net.minecraft.world.level.Level world, net.minecraft.world.entity.Entity entity, boolean fillBuckets)
      Run an auto-fill tick for filling currently held container items from this item.
      Parameters:
      toDrain - The item handler to drain from.
      world - The world.
      entity - The entity that holds this item.
      fillBuckets - If buckets should be filled.

    • tryFillContainerForPlayer

      Tries to fill a container item in a player inventory.
      Parameters:
      toDrain - The item handler to drain from.
      toFill - The container to try to fill.
      tickFluid - The fluid to fill with.
      player - The player that is the owner of toFill.
      Returns:
      The filled container
